main_files

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • main_files.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    This implements the backend storage for the color selection of orbs for the players in the game.
    Since:
    17 November 2017

      • setOthers

        public Settings setOthers(javafx.scene.paint.Color[] orbColors,
